name: You Meet In A Taxi
description:
You Meet In a Taxi is an indie tabletop/improv party game. You are someone hoping to get where you gotta go, and everyone around you is acting so weird. You of course are totally utterly normal, of course. Deal with strange and wild roadblocks with your three stats. And try not to annoy the cab driver to the point of getting kicked out. 

You Meet In a Taxi is a comedy of errors that keeps up the wild energy of urban life, with the power of escalation only baseless improvisation can provide!
